text: back in the day these gents were quite adept however the tides have turned and it would be advisable for you to direct your attention elsewhere

i decided to give this place a try for the first time and ordered their chicken schwarma wrap and falafel it wasnt the most terrible meal ive had but the chicken didnt have the flavor necessary to make it truly addictive im no falafel connoisseur but this particular one had a heavy presence of parsley resulting in a strong bitter and grassy aftertaste

i did not like their food at all had one dish sent it back the second plate was just as horrible not close to authentic mexican food at all the atmosphere is very nice though the authentic music made the atmosphere even better havent gone back since i went the first time go at your own risk

although i am fond of dining at innout the quality of service provided by this particular location is subpar upon receiving my order i was disappointed to find that the food was cold furthermore the frustrating experience continued as i waited for over 20 minutes at the drivethru window despite ordering solely a burger the inefficiency exhibited by the employees seriously hampers the overall customer experience it is high time they rectify these issues

during the summer season customers can enjoy the great atmosphere provided by the pleasant outdoor seating and have a taste of their nicely brewed coffee which boasts a distinct character unfortunately the lack of internet availability on weekends raises questions about their modernity as a coffee shop aiming to improve turnover its disheartening to encounter such unreliable internet service which also experiences frequent disruptions throughout the week
this pizza left such an awful taste in my mouth making it the worst food ive ever consumed

stopped for lunch and the employe was telling my  wifenhow he has worked for the company 7 years and still gets minimum wage or nless they have several locations i wonder  why as the families attitude sucksnrude racist chollo owners food average to below average inconsistent
does this establishment fall under the category of fast food if they cease serving breakfast at 10 am
affordable clean the employees are helpful and happy to help you im going back and will bring friends great place for locals

while its not bad it wouldnt be my first choice for this area the staff is friendly and the food is good but it lacks diversity and feels too much like a gentlemens club that being said its a great spot for guys who are really looking for a dinner experience catered towards them however i feel like theres something missing that would enhance the overall experience
i passed by this particular spot today and it turned out to be shut down
just ok the service was good the food not so much

have you considered having signage that clearly displays the hours of operation it appears that several groups had to wait for an extended period of time therefore having a digital sign that indicates when the establishment is closed would greatly improve customer service
weve never experienced a hotel as fantastic as this one the spacious rooms stunning views and ideal location create an unparalleled feeling of being on cloud nine

i used to be a big fan of wicked spoon but now this place has become my top choice for buffets in vegas every item was delicious and i couldnt find any noticeable mistakes while some dishes may be superior to others the overall experience of this buffet was outstanding

the overall experience was great with prompt and amiable service from an informed staff member who took my order the only drawback was the absence of a clearly marked choice for a smoothie with reduced carbs or sugar as the nutritional information presented on the menu was perplexing

what if there was signage clearly stating the operating hours there were instances where various groups had to wait for an extended period so why not utilize a digital sign that simply reads closed this straightforward approach would significantly improve customer service
the diner experience was satisfactory although slightly costly and the wait staff seemed somewhat distant
this place has an incredibly posh and welcoming vibe that draws you in nevertheless the prices are unjustifiably high and if you wish to enjoy a glass of wine be prepared to part ways with 20 bucks

unsure of how to assign an adequate star rating my hesitation stems from the fact that the food is truly exceptional especially the x girlfriend roll regrettably the service provided at this establishment remains consistently abysmal despite numerous attempts to enjoy a pleasant dining experience the recurring presence of unfriendly and disinterested staff members has left me with little desire to patronize this place again

my dining experience was elevated thanks to the incredible combination of flavors in the chicken shawarma hummus falafel and salad to top it off the inclusion of a sizeable velvety pita bread made the meal even more memorable in contrast to the usual cardboardlike texture of most pitas this one was exceptionally fresh light and allaround fantastic

the quality of the food is acceptable although the portion sizes are small and the average price for a main course is around 50 however the beautiful view makes it worth going up and taking a look i believe that next time i will dine somewhere with more delicious options and only visit this place for its barlounge
in the past these individuals were highly skilled and competent but circumstances have evolved suggesting that it may be prudent to explore other alternatives

the chicken shawarma along with the hummus falafel and salad exceeded my expectations in every way additionally i was pleasantly surprised by the generous serving of a big tender pita bread that came with it usually pitas are dry and thin but this one was incredibly soft fluffy and delightful to eat

arriving at this destination without reserving beforehand they still managed to fit me in although it was a little pricey and the quality of their nail game fell short i was fortunate enough to receive a discount by checking in this led to a final amount of 95 for my bill
you can never go wrong with the amazing pizza wing special

this is my initial visit and i decided to try the chicken schwarma wrap and falafel while it wasnt the absolute worst the chicken lacked sufficient flavor to capture my attention as for the falafel im no connoisseur but it had an overpowering taste of parsley which left a strong bitter and grassy sensation

while the appearance of this establishment screams luxury and promises a warm and hospitable experience the prices skyrocket to an unreasonable level making even a single glass of wine here cost an eyewatering 20

i have a deep affection for this establishment as i have been coming here for years over time i have become skilled at creating their renowned smash dish they continuously introduce new and exciting menu options that are always made with fresh ingredients and are delicious the lines move quickly and efficiently thanks to their wellmanaged processes additionally the management and staff are always pleasant which enhances the overall experience
it was an average experience considering the higher price for a diner and the wait staff displayed some aloofness

there was a time when i adored wicked spoon but now this establishment has become my top choice for buffets in vegas every dish exceeded my expectations and i could not spot any major flaws while some items stood out the overall magnificence of this buffet surpassed all others

in general the experience was extremely positive due to the fast and friendly service alongside a knowledgeable order taker although the smoothie tasted good my only reservation in giving it a fivestar rating was the absence of a clear option for a low carb or low sugar smoothie as the nutritional information presented on the menu was confusing
i have been to three smashburgers around az and this is by far the best one at least at this location there is consistency food is made well and warm it is a bit expensive but quite good i think

the hummus ive experienced is the ultimate choice for me as it complements every dish effortlessly with its wide selection of flavors my personal favorite combination includes garlic hummus combined with beet hummus while the other variants serve as delectable enhancements that elevate the taste of my meals

the chicken shawarma paired with the hummus falafel and salad was a true delight everything about the meal was exceptional including the large soft piece of pita bread that accompanied it unlike most pitas that are typically hard and thin this one was remarkably soft fluffy and delicious

i deeply cherish this establishment it has been my goto spot for many years during which i have mastered the art of crafting their renowned smash selection their everevolving array of dishes ensures theres something exciting to try every time all of which boast outstanding quality and delectable tastes the wait times are impressively brief as they have streamlined their processes remarkably well the amiable disposition exhibited by the management and staff always adds a delightful touch to the overall experience
kinda weird for a japanese place to be in a diner food was expensive and not that great   if im paying these prices i want good quality   id pass on this place
i was amazed by the perfectly cooked crispy duck with drunken noodles at the thai restaurant making it the most remarkable thai food i have ever savored

while this store boasts great discounts their takeout options leave much to be desired especially their pizza which has a truly unpleasant taste and an appalling crust resulting in us discarding the majority of it
i have never tasted such terrible food like this pizza
the ambiance of this place is undeniably elegant and remarkably inviting however the prices are exorbitant for the offerings where a simple glass of wine will set you back 20
previously these individuals boasted remarkable proficiency but as time has progressed it is advisable to seek out alternative solutions
they raised the prices on the machines by a quarter  there still arent enough laundry carts to go around there are like only 7 in the entire laundromat when its packed its every man for himself
this is my fourth visit here and once again ive had an amazing spray tan experience im definitely planning on coming back soon

very beautiful view from the dinning patio with waterfall and different kinds of wild flowers open from 6am11am for breakfast they have buffet and off the menu breakfast the orange blueberry pancake is a must they also brew starbucks coffee
this is my fourth visit here and once again ive had an excellent spray tan experience i am definitely planning on returning soon

having the option to check out using selfservice in a store that maintains cleanliness is a definite advantage i used to appreciate the fact that the pharmacy operated around the clock but sadly they made a decision to discontinue that service consequently i had to alter my shopping habits and opt for a store located nearer to my residence furthermore the continuous problem of not having my required medications in stock has inconvenienced me greatly despite these challenges indulging in their guilty pleasureworthy fried chicken always puts a smile on my face
the only thing fast about this fast food joint is the employee turnovernnlong waits in line and understaffed by people who dont want to be therenntruly dreadful

i recently tried this place for the first time and ordered the chicken schwarma wrap along with some falafel it wasnt the worst meal ive ever had but the chicken lacked the necessary flavor to make it truly enticing regarding the falafel i must admit that im not exactly a falafel aficionado but this particular version had a distinctive and somewhat unpleasant bitterness due to the abundance of parsley giving it a grassy undertone

why not consider installing signage that displays the operating hours several groups of people had to wait for quite some time so having a digital sign reading closed would be a straightforward customer service improvement

i caught the screening of g force in 3d at this venue where tickets were available for 1050 each the theater on average was quite expansive kept clean and had exceptional sound output making my experience a delightful one just before you enter theres a food court conveniently located allowing you to come prepared with a big bag and grab your food earlier pardon the redundancy if ive already pointed that out

i had a highly satisfactory experience with swift pleasant service and a wellinformed individual taking my order the one aspect that prevented it from being a perfect fivestar experience was the lack of a distinct choice for a smoothie with low carbs or low sugar as the nutrition details listed on the menu were unclear
110hr for labor ridiculous dan is the slowest and most ill informed person i have ever dealt with

i have a strong affinity for innout however this specific establishment fails to meet expectations on one occasion the meal i received was served cold while the duration of my stay at the drivethru exceeded 20 minutes given that i had merely ordered a burger this lack of efficiency displayed by the staff is truly disheartening it is indispensable that they make improvements promptly

even though i didnt make a reservation they still accommodated me at this location despite the slightly high prices and subpar quality of their nail services luckily i received a discount through checking in but my total bill still amounted to 95
looks like marie calendars again so glad  missed the pies

this establishment holds a special place in my heart i have been coming here for several years perfecting my technique in preparing their renowned smash dish they continuously innovate their menu providing a wide variety of fresh and tasty options the lines move quickly due to their efficient service and the management and staff always greet you with warmth and friendliness

the hummus ive had is the greatest and i incorporate it into various dishes because of its extensive range of flavors my preferred combination is garlic hummus mixed with beet hummus the other flavors give an extra kick to my meals  simply scrumptious

i tried on two occasions to make a reservation at this particular restaurant for an evening meal during the first attempt the staff requested that we wait on the line only to keep us waiting indefinitely until we finally decided to end the call disappointingly during my second endeavor they didnt even bother picking up the phone its a shame because ive heard great things about the quality of their cuisine but i wont be choosing this place as my dining destination

the slots here arent top shelf they lack a lot of the fun new slots that the other hotels on the strip have atmosphere is nice but waiting in a huge line for member services and buffet on a monday definitely not fun
once upon a former era these individuals exhibited considerable prowess and aptitude alas times have changed and it may behoove you to seek alternative avenues

without any prior booking i found myself at this establishment where they were willing to take me in however the prices were on the higher side and the overall standard of the nail services provided did not meet my expectations nonetheless by using the checkin facility i obtained a discount resulting in a final bill of 95
ive visited this place four times already and every time ive had a terrific spray tan experience ill definitely be back soon

i watched the movie g force in 3d at this place where tickets cost 1050 the average theater was spacious wellmaintained and had excellent sound quality it made me happy just before entering theres a food court so its convenient to carry a big bag and purchase your food beforehand did i mention that
the price didnt meet my expectations so i wouldnt revisit since it was quite underwhelming
good deli sandwiches otherwise its a boutique with boutique prices just another snobby place sorry sprouts i expected better

i decided to visit this place without making a reservation and surprisingly they were able to accommodate me however their prices were a bit on the expensive side and the level of expertise in nail services was not up to par nevertheless i managed to get a discount by checking in but my final bill still came out to 95

the overall experience was great with prompt amiable service and an informed staff member taking my order the only drawback was the absence of a clearly marked option for a low carb or low sugar smoothie as the nutritional information on the menu was perplexing

its decent but not my top option in this location the staff members are friendly and the food is satisfactory but it has too much of a manly club feeling to it having said that its a fantastic place for men who want to have dinner and are really seeking that kind of experience i think i need more of something

experience the pleasant and charming outdoor seating area during the summer season while indulging in their unique and tasteful coffee sadly the absence of internet access on weekends makes one question the modernity of this coffee shop as a business aiming to increase turnover its disheartening to encounter such poor internet service which also experiences frequent disruptions throughout the week
as i made my way through here today i observed that the establishment i encountered was not in operation

i was thoroughly impressed by the chicken shawarma alongside the hummus falafel and salad the entire experience exceeded my expectations moreover i couldnt get enough of the big tender pita bread that came with the dish typically pitas tend to be dry and thin but this one was irresistibly soft fluffy and enjoyable

the food quality is acceptable although the portion sizes are small and the typical cost of a main dish is around 50 however the stunning view justifies going up and taking a look i believe that in the future i will opt for a more delicious dining experience elsewhere and solely come here for the bar and lounge

the cleanliness of the store and the availability of a selfcheckout facility are major strengths however its disappointing that the pharmacy used to operate round the clock but recently decided to discontinue that service because of this i had to switch to a store nearer to where i reside furthermore their consistent inability to keep my required medications in stock has caused significant inconvenience on a different note i find immense pleasure in indulging myself with their guiltypleasureworthy fried chicken

is it possible to have signage indicating the hours of operation various groups were observed waiting for a significant amount of time instead of using traditional methods why not introduce a digital sign that communicates the business is closed such a straightforward approach would greatly improve customer service
the crispy duck with drunken noodles at the thai restaurant was cooked perfectly making it the most amazing thai food ive ever tasted

this hummus is truly remarkable as it brings an unmatched level of versatility to my cooking with its extensive collection of flavors i cant help but be captivated my goto combo involves combining garlic hummus and the delightful earthiness of beet hummus while incorporating the other options adds an extra burst of flavor resulting in pure gastronomic pleasure

i came to this place without a reservation but they still accommodated me albeit at a higher cost and their level of expertise in nail services was below average thankfully i received a discount by checking in yet my final bill amounted to 95

the thai restaurant exceeded my expectations with their flawlessly prepared crispy duck and deliciously seasoned drunken noodles solidifying its place as the ultimate destination for outstanding thai cuisine

let me tell you about the most fantastic hummus ive ever tasted its so versatile that i use it in all sorts of meals thanks to its diverse range of flavors my absolute favorite combination is garlic hummus with a hint of beet hummus additionally adding other flavorpacked hummus varieties turns any dish into a culinary delight  utterly delicious
i have visited this place on four occasions and every time my spray tan experience has been fantastic i plan on returning here again very soon

on two occasions i tried booking a table at this restaurant for dinner regrettably during the first attempt the staff requested that we wait on the line but kept us waiting indefinitely until we decided to end the call sadly they didnt even bother picking up the phone on the second attempt its a shame because the quality of their food has been highly praised but i wont choose this place as my dining destination
it was mediocre considering the high cost for a diner and the wait staff displayed a hint of aloofness

came by for a last minute ironing on my dress shirt for the wedding anna helped me out and was very nice and gave me great service knowing the time crunch i was in would definitely use them again if i was in the area and needed something done

the cuisine here is alright but the serving sizes are rather petite and you can expect to pay around 50 for a typical entree nonetheless the picturesque vista justifies making the effort to go upstairs and take a peek in my opinion ill opt for a more flavorsome dining experience elsewhere and reserve this place for relaxing in the bar or lounge area

i happened to watch g force in 3d at this specific establishment requiring a ticket cost of 1050 per person the theater itself provided an impressive experience with its commendable size impeccable cleanliness and extraordinary sound system what contributed further to my satisfaction was the presence of a food court right before entry enabling visitors to bring a sizable bag and purchase their meals in advance by the way did i mention this detail earlier
this particular dish i consumed was by far the most unsatisfactory food ive ever had
real good foodworth the price

the cost didnt match the experience thus i wouldnt recommend going back as it lacked excitement
eating this pizza was the most unpleasant culinary experience of my life
the ambience seemed lacking when i went to this place with a friend it was clean and nice but it could use more liveliness

the meal was alright but on the pricey side for a casual restaurant and the waiters had a somewhat detached demeanor

this is my first time trying this place and i ordered a wrap with chicken schwarma and falafel while it wasnt the worst meal ive ever had the chicken lacked enough flavor to really grab my attention as for the falafel im not an expert but it had a strong bitter and grassy taste due to the abundance of parsley

i had difficulty deciding how many stars to give because while the food particularly the x girlfriend roll was excellent the service was consistently terrible i have been here multiple times and every time i receive the same grumpy and unmotivated service that makes me not want to come back

i made two unsuccessful attempts to secure a reservation at this restaurant for dinner during the first try we were asked to hold on but left hanging until we eventually hung up on the second try they didnt even bother answering the phone its unfortunate because ive heard the food here is good but i wont be bringing my business here

although its not terrible its not my first choice for the area the staff are friendly and the food is good but it gives off a strong masculine vibe that feels overwhelming however its a great place for guys to have dinner if theyre specifically looking for that kind of atmosphere i just feel like theres something missing

the outside seating area is a great place to relax and enjoy the nice weather during summer and their coffee has a unique vibe however its disappointing that there is no internet access on weekends its hard to believe that in this day and age a coffee shop can have such poor internet service which also drops off frequently during the week
horribly slownnstaff repeats themselves and is slower than molasses in the winter nnorder wrong againnntaco salad bowl was stale not fresh
i ordered the 5 fried tacos the filling was a little bland at first i couldnt tell if it was shredded chicken or beef it was ok if i go back id would try a different dish thats a big if
despite the spotless environment and enjoyable pizza experience i had at this establishment i couldnt help but feel that the atmosphere was somewhat lifeless when i dined with a friend

i am a big fan of innout but this particular branch is terrible when my food arrived it was cold and i had to wait at the drivethru window for more than 20 minutes its disappointing how they could be so inefficient when all i ordered was a burger they really need to step up their game

im actually not a particularly big fan of starbucks for their coffee i find it kind of acidic and a bit strong for my liking i am a fan of their frapachinos and pastries but alas far too many calories for me to visit consistantly

mall doesnt have the best stores but has a footlocker eyebrow cart and bath and body works which are some of my favorites tons of parking as well def not your hang out kind of mall but since its conviently near me ill support the place

the option to use self checkout in a wellmaintained store is definitely a positive aspect in the past i used to rely on the pharmacy which used to be open 24 hours but unfortunately they have discontinued this service as a result i started frequenting a closer store instead additionally they often struggle with keeping my medications in stock causing difficulty for me on a lighter note their fried chicken is something i enjoy indulging in guiltily
i have never encountered such a repulsive dining experience like this meal

the food took an extended period to arrive and lacked flavor yet the standout feature of the establishment is the impressive collection of american art showcased in the dining room the children had a great time exploring the captivating artwork

without a doubt this is the most exceptional hotel experience weve had so far the immense rooms stunning vistas and fantastic location make you feel like youre on the highest peak

we had to endure an extensive wait for our meal and unfortunately it didnt live up to our culinary expectations however one positive aspect worth mentioning about this establishment is the presence of an expansive gallery featuring captivating united states art within the dining room furthermore the younger members of our group derived immense pleasure from examining the detailed portrayals of the different states
the atmosphere exudes sophistication and charm making it incredibly enticing however the expenses here are far too steep with a glass of wine costing a whopping 20 dollars
its quite pleasant and sanitary at this place but i feel they ought to inject some energy into the ambiance as my friend and i found it lacking in liveliness
upon my visit earlier today i realized that the establishment in question is not operational
can i consider this place a fast food restaurant even though they only serve breakfast until 10 am

we endured a considerable wait for our food only to be disappointed by its lackluster taste despite this setback the restaurant stands out for its extensive collection of american art exhibited throughout the dining space furthermore the children were delighted by the opportunity to marvel at the artwork
with its huge rooms beautiful views and perfect location this hotel outshines all others weve visited you cant find a better option that makes you feel like youre conquering every place in the world

phillys is your basic nofrills sports bar it is nothing to swoon over but it is laid back and a fun hangout spot  the staff was nice too and it was actually really refreshing to not be surrounded by a bunch of scottsdale aholes

this place holds a special place in my heart ive frequented it for several years now honing my skills to prepare their famous smash dish perfectly they constantly innovate their menu offering a plethora of new choices that are always prepared with utmost freshness and exquisite flavors the waiting times are impressively short thanks to the efficient service the management and staff never fail to delight with their warm and affable nature

its great to have the convenience of self checkout in a clean store it used to be even better when the pharmacy was open 24 hours but unfortunately they decided to get rid of that feature this caused me to change my routine and start going to a store closer to where i live another issue is that they frequently run out of my prescribed medications which can be quite bothersome however one thing that still brings me joy is treating myself to their tasty fried chicken
the way the crispy duck with drunken noodles was prepared at the thai eatery was spoton leaving me with no doubt that it was the best thai cuisine ive ever experienced

the waiting time for the food was excessively long and the taste fell below expectations however the redeeming quality of the restaurant lies in its impressive display of united states art in the dining area which adds to its appeal additionally the children found great joy in exploring the artwork depicting the states

this establishment is as advertised   it provides outstanding quality regardless of price   what is interesting to observe is their prices are substantially lower than anyone else that offers quality on the las vegas strip  kudos
the store offers fantastic deals but unfortunately their pizza is disappointing and we ended up throwing away most of it because the crust was terrible

i used to be a devoted follower of wicked spoon but this establishment has now become my favorite buffet in vegas every dish was excellent and i could not find any obvious errors while some items may be better than others overall this buffet was fantastic

this hummus is truly exceptional i include it in countless recipes due to its wide array of delectable flavors personally i love pairing garlic hummus with beet hummus while the remaining varieties serve as delightful enhancements that enrich the taste of my dishes
this store offers amazing deals however their pizza is quite disappointing and we had to toss out most of it because of the horrible crust
despite my love for innout this branch disappoints me with cold food and a long wait of over 20 minutes at the drivethru window just for a burger they really need to improve their efficiency

its adequate yet falls short of being my preferred choice in this area the staff members here are quite friendly and the cuisine is rather satisfying however the atmosphere tends to lean heavily towards a masculine club vibe that said it does serve as an excellent dinner destination specifically catering to mens preferences nevertheless i sense that theres a certain element lacking which would enhance the overall experience
one of my favorite places to eat if im looking for cheap and fast
the meal was just okay but a little pricey for a casual eatery and the waiters had a somewhat detached attitude

the outdoor seating during summer is pleasant and enjoyable serving decent coffee with a distinctive ambiance however its disappointing that they do not provide internet access on the weekends what era are we living in although i comprehend the need for coffee shops to optimize customer flow the weak internet connection persists even throughout weekdays
it wasnt worth the money spent and i wont be revisiting because it was fairly dull

have you thought about implementing signage indicating the hours of operation it seems like multiple groups had to endure long waits therefore having a digital sign displaying closed would greatly enhance customer service
after coming here four times my spray tan experiences have consistently been great it wont be long before i make another trip back
today i passed by this location and discovered that its closed

on my first visit i opted for the chicken schwarma wrap and falafel although it didnt rank as the most disappointing meal ever the chicken didnt have enough flavor to captivate me as for the falafel i dont consider myself an expert but there was an overwhelming presence of parsley resulting in a pronounced bitter and grasslike taste
is it accurate to describe this eatery as a fast food joint if their breakfast service ends at 10 oclock
is this place classified as fast food since they discontinue breakfast service at 10 am

the summertime offers a delightful and charming experience with their lovely outdoor seating area the coffee served has its own unique vibe on the downside the absence of internet connectivity on weekends leaves much to be desired it feels perplexing to witness such a setback in todays time moreover the internet connection tends to drop frequently even during weekdays
having been here four times already i can confidently say that each visit has provided me with a wonderful spray tan experience it wont be long before i return for another round
this hotel is by far the most incredible one weve ever stayed at the rooms are enormous the views are delightful and the location is unbeatable it truly makes you feel like youre on top of the world

i happened to see g force in 3d at this particular establishment where they charged a hefty 1050 for each ticket the theater experience itself was impressive  the size of the auditorium was commendable cleanliness was top priority and the sound system delivered exceptional quality what added to my contentment was that right before the entrance theres a food court allowing you to conveniently bring a large bag and get your food sorted out beforehand by the way did i already express this
youll always find a delicious pizza wing special on offer
this thai restaurant truly blew my mind with their flawlesslycooked crispy duck and extraordinary drunken noodles undoubtedly standing out as the epitome of the finest thai food ive ever enjoyed
popped in after a movie at harkins and the food was great my girlfriend who is very picky absolutely raved about the margaritas friendly servers and relaxed atmosphere as well

contemplating the number of stars to award my uncertainty arises from the contrasting qualities of this establishment undoubtedly the food is superb particularly the highly enjoyable x girlfriend roll unfortunately the service consistently proves to be utterly deplorable no matter how many times i have visited each encounter leaves me dismayed by the persistently grumpy and unmotivated staff members prompting me to seriously consider not returning here in the future
when i went to this restaurant with a friend i found it to be clean and pleasant however the atmosphere seemed dull and could benefit from some liveliness

once upon a time i had an intense passion for wicked spoon however this place has now risen to the status of being the ultimate buffet spot in vegas for me everything served here was exceptional and i struggled to find even a single notable flaw while a few selections stood out above the rest the overall magnificence of this buffet surpassed all expectations
